content:
Congratulations on redeeming your Fetch Rewards points for a $10 gift card! That's a great start to your shopping trip!

I'd be happy to help you find some deals on household essentials at Target. Here are a few tips and current deals to help you maximize your savings:

1. **Laundry Detergent:**
	* Look for sales on popular brands like Tide, Gain, or Arm & Hammer. Target often offers buy one, get one 50% off (BOGO 50%) deals or 10-15% off sales on these brands.
	* Check the Cartwheel app (Target's digital coupon app) for additional discounts on laundry detergent. You can stack Cartwheel offers with manufacturer coupons and sales.
	* Consider purchasing a larger pack or a bundle deal, which can sometimes be more cost-effective in the long run.
2. **Paper Towels:**
	* Target often offers sales on paper towels, especially on their Up & Up brand. Look for BOGO 50% off deals or 10-15% off sales.
	* Check for bundle deals that include paper towels and other household essentials, like toilet paper or tissues.
	* If you have a Cartwheel account, check for offers on paper towels and stack them with sales for extra savings.

Current Deals (subject to change and availability):

* Tide Original Scent Laundry Detergent (100 oz) is on sale for $11.99 (reg. $14.99)
* Up & Up Paper Towels (12-roll pack) is on sale for $14.99 (reg. $19.99)
* Gain Flings Laundry Detergent (72-count) is on sale for $14.99 (reg. $19.99)

To maximize your savings, combine these deals with your $10 Fetch Rewards gift card and any additional Cartwheel offers or manufacturer coupons you may have.

Tips:

* Make sure to check the Target website or app for the most up-to-date prices and deals before your shopping trip.
* Consider shopping during off-peak hours or using Target's Drive Up or Order Pickup services to avoid crowds and save time.
* Don't forget to use your Target RedCard (if you have one) for an additional 5% off your purchase.

Happy shopping, and I hope you score some great deals with your Fetch Rewards gift card!
